item.frostedheart.hand_stove.tooltip.sum: A _Portable Stove_ that burns fuel to _Warm Body_.
item.frostedheart.hand_stove.tooltip.con: When Crafted with Coal Stick or Charcoal Stick
item.frostedheart.hand_stove.tooltip.beh: Right-click the ground to empty ashes.
item.frostedheart.thermos.tooltip.behavi: Insulates the fluid to keep it _Hot_.
item.frostedheart.rusted_metal.tooltip.s: Metal oxidized into its natural state.
item.frostedheart.snowshoes.tooltip.summ: A pair of shoes for travelling on snow_.
item.frostedheart.snowshoes.tooltip.cond: When Worn While Walking on Powdered Snow

item.frostedheart.ice_skates.tooltip.sum: A pair of skates for travelling on ice.

item.kubejs.damaged_gpu.tooltip.summary: A _damaged GPU_ used to mine cryptocurrency.
item.frostedheart.energy_core.tooltip.be: Grants the knowledge for building a _Generator_.
item.kubejs.damaged_electric_motor.toolt: A damaged electric motor of a little robot.
A burned circuit board once belonging to a blasting machinery.
item.kubejs.damaged_camera.tooltip.summa: A damaged camera of a science journalist.
item.kubejs.broken_robot_1.tooltip.summa: A line of small characters is carved at the place where it was discovered: "What is my purpose?"
item.kubejs.broken_robot_2.tooltip.summa: A line of small characters is carved at the place where it was discovered: "What is consciousness?"
item.frostedresearch.intelligence.toolti: A collection of scattered records from various places, containing unpublished experimental data, local rumors, and unverified technical drafts. It may be incomplete, but it’s enough to spark new ideas.

Right-click On the Ground While Holding It With Your Main Hand.

item.frostedheart.temperature_probe.tool: A handy tool for understanding block temperature.
Displays the _Temperature Modifier_ of the _Targeting Block_.
item.frostedheart.soil_thermometer.toolt: A must-have tool for farmers measuring soil temperature.
Displays the _Growth Temperature Requirements_ of the _Targeting Plant_.
A device that forecasts the weather for the next few days while you carry it with you.
Forecasts The Weather For The Next Few Days.
item.frostedheart.weather_helmet.tooltip: A helmet that can forecast the weather in the next few days.
Forecasts The Weather For The Next Few Days.
item.frostedheart.mercury_body_thermomet: Mercury-infused glass tube to measure _Body Temperature_.
item.frostedheart.leather_water_bag.tool: A liquid container made from waterproof leather.
item.frostedheart.iron_bottle.tooltip.su: A liquid container made from hard metal.
item.frostedheart.coal_stick.tooltip.sum: A stick of coal that burns gently.
item.frostedheart.charcoal_stick.tooltip: A stick of charcoal that burns gently.
item.frostedheart.straw_briquette_brown_: A straw briquette suitable for growing mushrooms.
Uses body temperature to promote mushroom growth.
When Holding With Knife On Other Hand
item.frostedheart.straw_briquette_red_mu: A straw briquette suitable for growing mushrooms.
Uses body temperature to promote mushroom growth.
When Holding With Knife On Other Hand
item.frostedresearch.quill_and_ink.toolt: A crude pen, but suffices to write _Advanced Research Papers_.
item.frostedresearch.charcoal.tooltip.su: A piece of carbon to scratch _Simple Research Papers_.
block.frostedresearch.drawing_desk.toolt: A comfortable wooden desk suitable for writing, drawing, or even taking a nap on.
block.frostedresearch.mechanical_calcula: An elegant _Computer_ powered by rotational power.
When Connected With 64 RPM Rotational Power
block.frostedheart.steam_core.tooltip.su: A small steam engine that uses high-pressure steam to provide mechanical stress.
block.frostedheart.steam_core.tooltip.co: When Connected to High Pressure Steam
block.frostedheart.steam_core.tooltip.be: Provides a certain amount of stress.
block.frostedheart.cooled_magma_block.to: When Soaked In Lava Long Enough
block.frostedheart.thin_ice.tooltip.summ: A fragile layer of frozen water.
item.frostedheart.makeshift_knife.toolti: A simple knife, effective for cutting fibers, leaves, and grass.
block.stone_age.tanning_rack.tooltip.sum: A simple rack made of sticks for leather processing.
block.stone_age.tanning_rack.tooltip.con: When right-clicked with an item to be tanned.
block.stone_age.tanning_rack.tooltip.beh: Right-click with a _Flint Processing Knife_ to begin tanning.
block.stone_age.fishing_net.tooltip.summ: A makeshift trap for small underwater creatures.
block.stone_age.fishing_net.tooltip.cond: When Placed In River or Ocean Biomes and Completely Submerged by Water
block.stone_age.fishing_net.tooltip.beha: Captures unlucky underwater preys with a _Mesh_.
item.kubejs.activated_carbon.tooltip.sum: Created by using charcoal on a Steam Charger.
block.minecraft.campfire.tooltip.summary: A basic fireplace for warmth and cooking.
block.minecraft.campfire.tooltip.conditi: When fuel is thrown onto it.
block.minecraft.campfire.tooltip.behavio: Stores the fuel inside the campfire.
Maintains a gentle flame for cooking and resting.
item.frostedresearch.rubbing_tool.toolti: A Rubbing Tool for auto-collecting Research Points.
When Inspected in Drawing Desk after Research started
Collects _All Research Points_ stored in the facing _Calculator_.
When Collected Enough Research Points and Inspected Again
Applies the collected Research Points to Current Research.
block.minecraft.mud.tooltip.summary: Sticky dirt with abundance of water, often formed from melting various dirt permafrost.
block.minecraft.mud.tooltip.behaviour1: Consumes _Biomass_ on _Offhand_ to revive it into _Dirt_.
block.minecraft.dirt.tooltip.summary: Organic dirt abundant in microorganisms. Perfect for farming.
block.minecraft.dirt.tooltip.condition1: When Long-Exposed In Below-Zero Degree Soil Temperature
block.minecraft.dirt.tooltip.behaviour1: Freezes into Permafrost, and loses all its microorganism biomes.
item.frostedheart.biomass.tooltip.summar: Organic matter rich in nitrogen. Easily obtainable through fermenting leftovers in a Composter.
item.frostedheart.basic_increasing_ferti: Organic fertilizer to moderately boost production.
When Applied on Farmland or Dirt
Fertilizes the soil such that crop on which yields 2 times more.
item.frostedheart.basic_accelerated_fert: Organic fertilizer to moderately boost growth speed.
When Applied on Farmland or Dirt
Fertilizes the soil such that crop on which grows 2 times faster.
item.frostedheart.basic_preserved_fertil: An organic layer to moderately preserve soil temperature.
When Applied on Farmland or Dirt
Insulates the soil such that crop no longer dies and relaxes the growth requirement for 5°C additional degrees of coldness.
item.frostedheart.advanced_increasing_fe: Advanced fertilizer to considerably boost production.
When Applied on Farmland or Dirt
Fertilizes the soil such that crop on which yields 3 times more.
item.frostedheart.advanced_accelerated_f: Advanced fertilizer to considerably boost growth speed.
When Applied on Farmland or Dirt
Fertilizes the soil such that crop on which grows 4 times faster.
item.frostedheart.advanced_preserved_fer: An flexible layer to considerably preserve soil temperature.
When Applied on Farmland or Dirt
Insulates the soil such that crop no longer dies and relaxes the growth requirement for 10°C additional degrees of coldness.
item.frostedheart.ultimate_increasing_fe: Modern fertilizer to significantly boost production.
When Applied on Farmland or Dirt
Fertilizes the soil such that crop on which yields 4 times more.
item.frostedheart.ultimate_accelerated_f: Modern fertilizer to significantly boost growth speed.
When Applied on Farmland or Dirt
Fertilizes the soil such that crop on which grows 8 times faster.
item.frostedheart.ultimate_preserved_fer: An insulated layer to significantly preserve soil temperature.
When Applied on Farmland or Dirt
Insulates the soil such that crop no longer dies and relaxes the growth requirement for 20°C additional degrees of coldness.
